definition[0]: to put the engine of a vehicle into a lower gear in order to go slower
definition[1]: if someone downshifts, they choose to do a less important or difficult job, so that they do not have to worry about their work and have more time to enjoy their life
definition[2]: if someone downshifts, they willingly choose to do a less important, difficult, or STRESSFUL job, so that they are under less pressure and have more time to enjoy their life
